paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.futureA: the new A to ramp towards
params.futureATime: timestamp when the new A should be reached

setFee(uint256,uint256).details: adminFee cannot be higher than 100% of the swap fee swap fee cannot be higher than 1% of each swap

params.newAdminFee: new admin fee to be applied on future transactions
params.newSwapFee: new swap fee to be applied on future transactions

rampA(uint256,uint256).notice: Start ramping up or down A parameter towards given futureA_ and futureTime_ Checks if the change is too rapid, and commits the new A value only when it falls under the limit range.
